subject: Re: Cam Aspire 3690
body:
vivek shah escreveu:
> On 7/2/07, Givaldo de Cidra  wrote:
>> Hi,
>>
>> I have a laptop "Acer Aspire 3690" and the webcam integrated it does not
>> function.
>>
>> Somebody can I help me?
>>
> Install camorama using sudo apt-get install camorama and google for it
> for specs if it does not autodetect and in case it doesn't work out
> subscribe to ekiga and google for a howto and it will work out with
> your webcam. Here I mean the ekiga software. Check it out
>
> All the best.
>
> Regards,
> Vivek


I installed camorama and now I'll go to look for howto work out with my 
webcam.


Thanks,

Cidra, Givaldo


--
